vision.notes: Likely relies on vision for prey detection and navigation, typical for predatory insects. Exact capabilities unknown from provided text, but inferred as present.

mechanosensation.notes: Likely present for detecting air currents and substrate vibrations related to prey or predators. Exact capabilities unknown from provided text, but inferred as present in most insect families.

chemoreception.notes: Likely present for detecting chemical cues related to prey or mates. Exact capabilities unknown from provided text, but inferred as present in most insect families.
